alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; Eastern Lincoln County; Northwest Highlands; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Southwest Chaves County; Southwest Mountains; West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 24 at 2:53AM MDT until October 24 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, Northwest Highlands, West Central Mountains, West Central Highlands, Southwest Mountains, Chaves County Plains, Eastern Lincoln County, and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 7 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Chaves County Plains; Eastern Lincoln County; Northwest Highlands; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Southwest Chaves County; Southwest Mountains; West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains
